catalogue: CONSTRAINT catalogue_author FOREIGN KEY(author_id) REFERENCES author(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
CONSTRAINT catalogue_article FOREIGN KEY(article_id) REFERENCES article(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
CONSTRAINT catalogue_conference FOREIGN KEY(conference_id) REFERENCES conference(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
CONSTRAINT alias_article FOREIGN KEY(article_alias_id) REFERENCES article_alias(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
CONSTRAINT alias_author FOREIGN KEY(author_alias_id) REFERENCES author_alias(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
